meanings.sent1: The interannual weather patterns affect our crops each year.
meanings.sent2: The interannual migration of birds is a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The interannual family reunion always brings laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The interannual cycle of seasons reminds us of the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The interannual festival is eagerly anticipated by the whole town.

meanings.definition: Relating to or happening every year.
meanings.sent1: The interannual rainfall in this region is predictable.
meanings.sent2: The interannual school holidays give students a break.
meanings.sent3: The interannual plant sale is a blooming success.
meanings.sent4: The interannual report card day is both exciting and nerve-wracking.
meanings.sent5: The interannual fireworks display lights up the night sky.
